trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object that specifies the primary connection.
A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object that specifies the connection that provides the referral.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 物件，指定提供轉介的連接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object that specifies the distinguished name (DN) of the desired entry in the referred server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件，指定參考之伺服器中所需項目的辨別名稱 (DN)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the identifier for the referred LDAP directory.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> 物件，指定參考之 LDAP 目錄的識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to pass to the referred server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 物件，指定傳遞至參考之伺服器的認證。

trans-unit.source: The LUID for the current user.
The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryForConnectionCallback" /> delegate determines whether there is a cached connection available for use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryForConnectionCallback" /> 委派 (Delegate) 可以判斷是否有可用的快取連接。

trans-unit.source: A cached <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> is returned, if there is one available.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在可用的快取連接，則會傳回快取的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" />，

trans-unit.source: If no cached connection is available, <see langword="NULL" /> is returned.
